text: Henrik Siewert Natanael Öholm (7 August 1939 - 25 January 2017), better known as Siewert Öholm, was a Swedish journalist and television presenter. He worked for Sveriges Radio between 1971 and 2002. He also worked on shows for Sveriges Television. He was also a debater for social conservatism values. Öholm was born in Husby. He was married twice and had four sons, including MP politician Oskar Öholm. Öholm died from liver cancer on 25 January 2017 in Växjö. He was 77. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Swedish journalists Category:Swedish radio personalities Category:Swedish television presenters
title: Siewert Öholm
